To illustrate the algorithm, it was implemented on graphics cards using CUDA, a programming frame- work for NVIDIA graphics cards. publication.title: Parallel Enumeration of Shortest Lattice Vectors
publication.keyword: Lattice Basis Reduction;Lattice Reduction;Parallel Algorithm;Shortest Vector Problem;
publication.abstract: Lattice basis reduction is the problem of nding short vec- tors in lattices. The security of lattice based cryptosystems is based on the hardness of lattice reduction. Furthermore, lattice reduction is used to attack well-known cryptosystems like RSA. One of the algorithms used in lattice reduction is the enumeration algorithm (ENUM), that provably nds a shortest vector of a lattice.

publication.title: Merkle Tree Traversal Revisited
publication.abstract: We propose a new algorithm for computing authentication paths in the Merkle signature scheme. Compared to the best algorithm for this task, our algorithm reduces the worst case running time consid- erably.
